website_summaries.verdict: While this ladle won't work for everyone, it's worth considering for consumers who need a utensil that makes pouring liquid into small areas easy.
pros: An excellent choice for home canning, serving gravy, or pouring liquid into small bowls or containers, thanks to the wide dual pouring spouts
Does a good job reducing messes
11.5-inch length is versatile for many uses
cons: Not for use on non-stick surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Ladle??
customer_reviews.text: Does what its meant to do. Only problem is that it is extremely sharp on the edges. Do not know if I recieved a defective one but while cleaning it I cut my hand very deeply as if it was a sharp knife. Warning to everyone!! You should be able to find a better ladle that is not somehow sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and I love them. Not a lot of mess.
customer_reviews.author: nancy jaecks

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheap I probably wouldn't recommend it. The spouts and the handle length are ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap I probably wouldn't recommend it. The spouts and the handle length are good but it's too lightweight for me. The place where the handle is applied to the ladle doesn't seem very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Needed this ladle for a hot cocoa bar and it was perfect! The slots on the lake were great for pouring into cups. Exactly what I needed and couldn't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular ladle
customer_reviews.text: After a short search for a new soup spoon, Amazon pulled this beauty up as a suggestion. I’m glad we took it, pours most liquids easily into a jar or container with equally small opening. The handle and spoon are made of good quality. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Genghis P Tan

customer_reviews.title: A Double Duty Ladle
customer_reviews.text: In a recent move, I misplaced my souple ladles. I didn't want to duplicate what I already have (& will find), so I bought this canning ladle because of the pouring lip. I LOVE IT! I think I'll just keep using this and donate my regular soup ladles. It's easier to pour soup into bowls, plus it is an attractive piece. It appears to be sturdily built. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: carolanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for ladling things.
customer_reviews.text: It's a metal ladle. I've found it really good at dipping into liquids and transporting them to another location. Like filling a jar or a bowl. The long handle is nice. Overall it seems useful which is why I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Working very well for our family
customer_reviews.text: This ladle is big and tall but just right for the lentil soup I make in our tall cooking pans. We like the fact that there are pouring spouts on both sides so my left handed son can use it as well as the righties in the house. I wish the handle was a bit more bulky for grabbing but that might be just Mom, the rest of the family has no issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my soup pot great but I should have picked one with a bigger ladle cup!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Harshman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are new into canning, and when we went on our making applesauce adventure, we knew we would need a larger ladle handle and this worked beautifully. Clean, and sleek design! Plus it hangs on the pot when cooking and later on our pot hanging rack! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: H and H HONEY

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted the martha stuart one, but can't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted the martha stuart one, but can't seem bto buy anywhere. This one is ok, but you have to be more careful not to spill since the pour spout is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Brent.the.tall.guy

customer_reviews.title: But if it were the correct size it would have been awesome to use
customer_reviews.text: Was too small for what I was going to use it for. I needed a 16-24oz ladle. Too small to fill quart jars fast. I just didn't read the discription close enough. But if it were the correct size it would have been awesome to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaelf

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladle not just for canning
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good ladle for a hot chocolate bar I was doing for a party. This one was the perfect size for filling a 6-8oz cup. The spout allowed you to pour without spilling hot chocolate all over. It's made very well and like that it's stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward, well made, works...doesn't drip
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is. Canning ladle. Stainless steel. Good construction, used several times now. I like the stainless because I can sanitize it easily. Cleans easily, makes short work out of pouring into jars.
customer_reviews.author: AK Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must for snow melting at elevation on Denali Expedition! PeakStratagem.com
customer_reviews.author: PeakStratagem

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable & Awkward
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable handle, awkward to pour. The best thing about it is the hook at the end.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenMath

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's larger than I thought, which is fine with me. It's substantial and solid, and it's going to come in very handy for dishing up soups and stew.
customer_reviews.author: N. Allen

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very handy item to add to canning equipment. It is quite a bit larger than the photo depicts, but still very usable. I bought one for my daughter, too.
customer_reviews.author: MotherChickie

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladle.
customer_reviews.text: Great Ladle... Good size when dishing out soups or stews.. Seems quite sturdy.. Perfect for canning I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: MzClementine

customer_reviews.title: holds 5 oz not 7
customer_reviews.text: had to return, holds only 5 oz (to the brim) not the 7 ounces as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, wont bend, nice long handle and love that it has pouring spouts. Perfect for soups and canning...I use it for both!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for aguas frescas that i made for my son’s baptism! I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for canning! Love the handle and pour spout. Awesome! Long for deep pots and handy to use. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: self
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my canning. It works really good and helps out a lot. It makes canning easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Kerschner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen tool. I use it for filling jars when canning. No more fishing out smaller spoons or cups from the hot pot.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Norpro products always are top of the line! Always look for them when ordering and can always depend on the quality
customer_reviews.author: VICKI TACKES

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. A perfect size for soups or canning ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality . A perfect size for soups or canning and I love the dual spouts. Good for left or right handed users. I would definitely recommend this ladle to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marian F

customer_reviews.title: Makes canning much easier
customer_reviews.text: I would never had thought a ladle would make such a difference in the canning process, but I was wrong - this ladle makes filling canning jars so much easier, even if you don't use a funnel.
customer_reviews.author: melhop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality ladle, but the redeeming quality is the pour spouts. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DriscollTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Ladle a joy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using this ladle. Much less spills and the long handle is great for use with hot liquids.
customer_reviews.author: R.J. Leger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It will be great for my stainless steel pots.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Even with the canning funnel in the jar it doesn't work great and is not very efficient
customer_reviews.text: Its not any larger than a regular soup ladle. Also the little spouts on each side don't funnel as well as you would think. I was pouring tomato juice into containers and about 1/3 of the juice ends up on the counter unless you just pour the ladle as fast as you can tip it. Even with the canning funnel in the jar it doesn't work great and is not very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: REALLY SHARP - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Sharp enough to cut your hand! Looks like it could have been a good product if they sanded down the edges of this extremely sharp metal. This is a huge hazard to young kids who like playing with mom's spatula's etc. or older folks on blood thinners - it's dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: was just right for canning applesauce
customer_reviews.text: Used this to ladle warm/hot applesauce into the canning jars and for this it worked great. I found 2 ladles full would fill a pint jar.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll B

customer_reviews.title: Pours Well and Cleans Easily
customer_reviews.text: They clean easily, do not get lost in the pot and pour well. I've never used the ladle for canning, but it works well for soups, punch, etc. too. Why limit yourself? The only improvement I can think of would be if it were one solid piece of stainless instead of the handle connecting to the back of the ladle, but that isn't a dealbreaker by any means. In fact, I bought one of these ladles for myself and then gave two as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Denise

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Great value, great quality, easy to hold and use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Quality. Handle is ok and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: paul azar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and dishwasher safe ladle that's easy to use when serving up some great stews, soups, and other foods
customer_reviews.author: NEA Sound

customer_reviews.title: better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: we needed a ladle for serving drinks (mulled wine), and like that this one had pour spouts. we were pleasantly surprised that it is actually nicer in person than the pictures suggest.
customer_reviews.author: jdl

customer_reviews.title: long enough even for cooking in a campfire
customer_reviews.text: great long handled ladle. Used it for campfire cooking in the coals. Long enough handle that even my "burn'a'phobic" teenagers were eventually not afraid to use it.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool for canning and all year use
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool for canning and making large batches of soup. Long handle prevents steam burns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this giant ladle
customer_reviews.text: Love this giant ladle! It is definitely pretty huge, but It's perfect for stews and other soups. Great stainless steel quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I used this ladle for the first time since purchasing- about two months. I used it for homemade chicken soup for canning. Not only did it hold the contents well but the shape also allowed for it to hold a good amount at once.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for canning
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I use it for waterbath canning when I need to fill my jars with applesauce, salsa, etc. Good quality and it will last a lifetime, so great value
customer_reviews.author: GorgeousRobi

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps better for jam
customer_reviews.text: Thin handle hurts hand, doesnt really pour cleanly into jar. Used for canning tomatoes. Perhaps better for jam? Will try next season.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Best ladle ever
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy ladle. I am not using it for canning but the little spouts on either side are great for tasting etc.! It came quickly & was packed so well it was silly. Its only a metal ladle after all. In a giant box.lol
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty good, although the handle could stand to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good, although the handle could stand to be more substantial, but once you get the trick of it you are not likely to spill or drip much.
customer_reviews.author: christopher steen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and I love the hook to hang it on the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The canning ladle works great and has minimal dripping. It works well when I do some canning. The spout on either end is nice to have too.
customer_reviews.author: Warpiper

customer_reviews.title: It's a Ladle, it Pours!
customer_reviews.text: It's a ladle, it works. Spouts on both sides. Only washed by hand. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: MI Mud Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Canning Ladle.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent canning ladle. It exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: redthebarber

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it result to be to big and the two exit made it messy
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have used this ladle just once when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used this ladle just once when I made creme brulee. I used it to ladle the hot creme brulee into the ramekins and it was so easy. I plan to use it for soups this winter too.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Can't go rong.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my wife was looking for. Good quality and the right size .
customer_reviews.author: robert etype

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, I use it to ladle jellies into jars, like the dual spouts.
customer_reviews.author: NGFL

product_meta.title: Norpro Stainless Steel Canning Ladle, Set of 1, Silver
product_meta.description:
Measures: 13.5" X 5" X 3.75"/ 34cm x 13cm x 9.5cm


Capacity: 7oz


Perfect for serving and pouring; take the mess out of putting food where you want it to be. Ideal for canning! Fill your canning jars quickly, safely and with less mess! Dual spouts allow for pouring liquids or gravy from either side. Long 11.5-inch handle allows for easy access into your deeper stock or soup pots. Constructed of high quality, polished stainless steel. Hang hook for easy storage.

Norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision to design, manufacture, and supply the highest caliber kitchenware. Norpro’s offering of innovative, high quality Product for cooking, preparing and serving food are produced with superior materials and craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: Capacity: 7oz. Perfect for serving and pouring; take the mess out of putting food where you want it to be.
Ideal for canning! Fill your canning jars quickly, safely and with less mess!
Dual spouts allow for pouring liquids or gravy from either side.
Long 11.5-inch handle allows for easy access into your deeper stock or soup pots.
Constructed of high quality, polished stainless steel. Hang hook for easy storage.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
